#summary Papers about Native Client technology

We've published the following papers about Native Client technology:

  * [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/svn/data/docs_tarball/nacl/googleclient/native_client/documentation/nacl_paper.pdf Native Client: A Sandbox for Portable, Untrusted x86 Native Code], IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy, May 2009
  * [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/svn/data/site/NaCl_SFI.pdf Adapting Software Fault Isolation to Contemporary CPU Architectures], Originally posted February 2010, revised June 2010. To appear in the 19th USENIX Security Symposium, August 2010.
  * [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/svn/data/site/pnacl.pdf PNaCl: Portable Native Client Executables], February 2010
